description:
Updated Sept. 18, 2015! 5 New Videos Added...

Dropbox and cloud storage offer some great ways and workflows to be more productive.

Our clear professional videos will address everything from:

  • Providing a simple backup solution for your important files
  • Having a way to backup the photos you take with your iPhone or other smartphone
  • Giving you a way to share Large Files that are too big to email
  • Empowering you with a workflow to request files from clients and friends
  • Increasing your team productivity with file sharing
  • Enabling Two-Step Authentication for Security
  • Selectively syncing folders to your computer and leaving other folders on the internet
  • Synchronizing all of your important files on your computer, regardless of what folder they are in.
  • Using the Dropbox iOS app on iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch. (Android App functions similarly)

This course is perfect for everyone including:

  • Those who are new to cloud storage
  • People who work on teams and projects with a lot of documents
  • Anyone who needs a simple and easy way to backup important files
  • People who want to be more productive with their file management
  • Users of Dropbox who want to go to the next level
title: Leverage Dropbox Cloud Storage to Boost Your Productivity
